text.content:
Spiked

When you succeed on a Strength (Athletics) check to shove or trip a creature while wielding a shield with this property, the creature takes kinetic damage using the spiked damage (which appears in parentheses with the property) + your Strength modifier. If you use a shield with this property as an improvised weapon, the damage increases by one step (from [[/r d4]] to [[/r d6]], [[/r d6]] to [[/r d8]], or [[/r d8]] to [[/r 2d4]]).
